alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 1:38PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron affecting Bibb, Crawford, Peach and Houston Counties. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Echeconnee Creek at Houston Road near Byron. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding of woodlands occurs upstream and downstream from the gage on Houston Road. Portions of creek access roads and low lying areas will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:15 PM EST Thursday was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The creek is near crest and will slowly fall to below flood stage around sunset. - Flood stage is 15 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
